content.rendered:
The TON Chain (The Open Network) is a decentralized blockchain platform originally developed by Telegram, designed to offer fast, scalable, and efficient transaction processing through its innovative sharding technology. With a strong focus on seamless Web3 integration, TON supports decentralized applications (dApps), storage solutions, and private, low-fee transactions, all powered by its native cryptocurrency, Toncoin.

On this page, we showcase tokenless projects built on TON, which currently don’t have a native token. These projects may, however, consider future airdrops as part of their development, offering early users potential rewards down the line. Stay tuned and explore the possibilities of participating in the next wave of blockchain innovation without upfront investment.
